channel.title: Rstats on jeslacourse
channel.description: Recent content in Rstats on jeslacourse

item.title: Barriers in Biology
item.description: This study tracks the impact of course-taking and change-in-major habits on award-earning and transfers for the 224 Biology for Transfer majors in the 2017-18 cohort.

item.title: Feature Choice in Classification of Wheat Kernels
item.description: Feature selection is just as important as hyperparameter choice, yet many classifiers cherry-pick features without much empirical basis. While hyperparameters are easier to tweak, we must account for the impact of boosting these hyperparameters and the risk and impact of overfit.

item.title: Highlights and Facets for Visualizing Categorical Data
item.description: Using gghighlight() to effectively visualize comparisons between factors
